publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-198 Cathy Jamieson: Jubilee 2000 Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates all organisations and individuals in Scotland who have declared their support for the objectives of the Jubilee 2000 Campaign, and resolves to support the case for the cancellation of debt repayments by developing countries.
S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Fiona McLeod*

S1M-198 Cathy Jamieson: Jubilee 2000 Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates all organisations and individuals in Scotland who have declared their support for the objectives of the Jubilee 2000 Campaign, and resolves to support the case for the cancellation of debt repayments by developing countries. Supported by: Tricia Marwick, Fiona McLeod
S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Malcolm Chisholm*
S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Irene McGugan*, Fiona Hyslop*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Dr Elaine Murray*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Linda Fabiani*

S1M-198 Cathy Jamieson: Jubilee 2000 Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates all organisations and individuals in Scotland who have declared their support for the objectives of the Jubilee 2000 Campaign, and resolves to support the case for the cancellation of debt repayments by developing countries. Supported by: Tricia Marwick, Fiona McLeod, Malcolm Chisholm, Irene McGugan, Fiona Hyslop, Nora Radcliffe, Dr Elaine Murray, Roseanna Cunningham, Linda Fabiani, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Karen Gillon*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Brian Adam*, Ms Sandra White*, Bristow Muldoon*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr John McAllion*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Johann Lamont*

S1M-198 Cathy Jamieson: Jubilee 2000 Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates all organisations and individuals in Scotland who have declared their support for the objectives of the Jubilee 2000 Campaign, and resolves to support the case for the cancellation of debt repayments by developing countries. Supported by: Tricia Marwick, Fiona McLeod, Malcolm Chisholm, Irene McGugan, Fiona Hyslop, Nora Radcliffe, Dr Elaine Murray, Roseanna Cunningham, Linda Fabiani, Mr Adam Ingram, Karen Gillon, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Brian Adam, Ms Sandra White, Bristow Muldoon, Margaret Jamieson, Mr John McAllion, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Johann Lamont
S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Tavish Scott*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Tommy Sheridan*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Alex Neil*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Cathie Craigie*

S1M-198 Cathy Jamieson: Jubilee 2000 Campaign-That the Parliament congratulates all organisations and individuals in Scotland who have declared their support for the objectives of the Jubilee 2000 Campaign, and resolves to support the case for the cancellation of debt repayments by developing countries. Supported by: Tricia Marwick, Fiona McLeod, Malcolm Chisholm, Irene McGugan, Fiona Hyslop, Nora Radcliffe, Dr Elaine Murray, Roseanna Cunningham, Linda Fabiani, Mr Adam Ingram, Karen Gillon, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Brian Adam, Ms Sandra White, Bristow Muldoon, Margaret Jamieson, Mr John McAllion, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Johann Lamont, Tavish Scott, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Tommy Sheridan, Andrew Wilson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Neil, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Cathie Craigie, Rhoda Grant*

S1M-198 Jubilee 2000 Campaign (lodged on 8 October 1999) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-198 Cathy Jamieson: Jubilee 2000 Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates all organisations and individuals in Scotland who have declared their support for the objectives of the Jubilee 2000 Campaign, and resolves to support the case for the cancellation of debt repayments by developing countries. S1M-198 Cathy Jamieson: Jubilee 2000 Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates all organisations and individuals in Scotland who have declared their support for the objectives of the Jubilee 2000 Campaign, and resolves to support the case for the cancellation of debt repayments by developing countries. Supported by: Tricia Marwick, Fiona McLeod, Malcolm Chisholm, Irene McGugan, Fiona Hyslop, Nora Radcliffe, Dr Elaine Murray, Roseanna Cunningham, Linda Fabiani, Mr Adam Ingram, Karen Gillon, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Brian Adam, Ms Sandra White, Bristow Muldoon, Margaret Jamieson, Mr John McAllion, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Johann Lamont, Tavish Scott, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Tommy Sheridan, Andrew Wilson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Neil, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Cathie Craigie, Rhoda Grant, Scott Barrie, Dennis Canavan, Donald Gorrie, Trish Godman, Robert Brown, Mr Mike Rumbles, Cathy Peattie*
